page.title: 03Life Styles/Media.T.V.Prog.
page.content: According to the results of our surveys television viewing is the main leisure activity for the majority of the population. The choice of programmes varied enormously according to the age of the viewer. Most adult men prefer to watch sport,gardening and News programmes,while women favour the "Soap Operas". The favourite programme of the majority of 12 year olds is"The Young Ones" ,while the younger children prefer "Grange Hill" or "Dallas". Parents of younger children told us that the under-fives like to watch "Play School". "Postman Pat" is the programme which the younger boys seem to enjoy the most. While many women complained that there was too much sport on the television most children thought there were too many News type programmes.
